text: Ezɨ Mikaia Ahap mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ garima, Israelian mɨdorozir gumaziba mati, ghuaviba puvatɨzir sipsipbar mɨn pura tintinibar mɨghsɨabagh mɨri. Ezɨ kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God barazi, a ghaze, ‘Gumazamizir kabar faragh mangamin gumazir dapaniba puvatɨ. Nɨ me amangightɨ, me vaghvagh uan nguibabar mangɨ egh deraghvɨra ikɨ.’ ”
